Catalogue values for Blood Glucose Test Strips (Glucostrips) with Glucometer

Category Specification Bid Requirement (Allowed Values)
GENERAL FEATURES One compatible glucometer should be provided free of cost on purchase of every 800, 1000 Or lower
GlUCOSTRIP SPECIFICATIONS Enzyme used in the glucostrip Glucose Oxidase, Glucose Dehydrogenase (GDH)
Shelf life of glucostrips from the date of manufacture 18, 24, 30, 36 Or higher
Shelf life of glucostrips after first opening of the strip pack(Months) 6 Or higher
Number of strips packed in one container 50, 100
GLUCOMETER SPECIFICATIONS Free from Manual Coding Yes

ai_summary.summary: The document is a web page for the Government e-Marketplace (GeM) Bidding portal. It features navigation options for users to access help resources, bid information, sign up as buyers or sellers, and corporate information such as About Us, Statistics, and Careers. The site provides support through FAQs, video guides, training, and a support desk, and offers accessibility features like language selection and font size adjustment.
